fields.description:
### Objectives
- Continue on e2e testing ('Real' interaction on environments) 
- Increase coverage of E2E testing

### Definition of done
- The main flows are covered

comments.text: Robin trained with Batman in Wayne Manor. The Batmobile raced through the streets. Poison Ivy controlled the plants in Robinson Park.Nightwing assisted Batman on patrol. Bane challenged Batman in a test of strength. The Batmobile raced through the streets.Scarecrow spread fear toxin throughout the city.

Hum there was some before the end of v1.0, it seems that there has been some mix up with the task story. A lot of tasks are now under https://internal-system/issue/SA-5189 (Frontend improvement) I will reorder that today
